dict.string: en
Green kale
A creamy yet refreshing green smoothie that will keep you energized for hours

array.string: A creamy yet refreshing green smoothie that will keep you energized for hours.
Kale and other leafy greens contains antioxidants and has alkalising and anti-inflammatory qualities.
Add a teaspoon of wheatgrass for an extra nutrition boost.
Mix all the ingredients in a blender on high speed until smooth

array.string: This green and creamy smoothie is a great vegan alternative to traditional yoghurt.
Start your day with this healthy bowl, topped with fresh berries, nuts and seeds.
Mix all the ingredients in a blender on high speed until smooth
Add a small splash of water if the frozen ingredients doesn’t blend

dict.string: Veggie detox
This fresh and detoxing veggie smoothie is like drinking a salad

array.string: Drinking green smoothies is an easy way of making sure you get your daily greens. This fresh and detoxing veggie smoothie is like drinking a salad.
Add some parsley for extra iron and flavour.
For a sweeter and less green-tasting smoothie just replace the avocado with equal amounts of mango.
Squeeze the juice out of the lemon.
Chop the apple and remove the seeds.
Mix all the ingredients in a blender on high speed until smooth.

dict.string: Green machine
Adding leafy greens to the smoothie is a great way of increasing your daily intake of vegetables

array.string: Adding leafy greens to the smoothie is a great way of increasing your daily intake of vegetables.
Dark green leafy vegetables are good sources of many vitamins (such as vitamins A, C, K and folate) and minerals (like iron and calcium).
Add some spirulina for extra nutrition.
Squeeze the juice out of the orange and lime.
Mix all the ingredients in a blender on high speed until smooth

dict.string: Orange is the new black
This smoothie will give you a great C-vitamin kick that will help to keep that cold away

array.string: This smoothie will give you a great C-vitamin kick that will help to keep that cold away.
Not only does it taste great, it will also boost your immune system. The ginger adds some healthy heat and has anti-inflammatory properties.
Juice the carrots, orange, lemon and ginger in a juice extractor.
Mix the juice with the mango in a blender on high speed until smooth.

dict.string: Scandinavian berries
Scandinavian berries are true super berries that contains lots of antioxidants and nutrients

array.string: Scandinavian berries are true super berries that contains lots of antioxidants and nutrients.

Try experimenting with other Scandinavian berries, like red or black currants, raspberries or wild strawberries. Just switch one of the berries in the recipe to whatever berry you have in the fridge, freezer or in your garden.
Mix all the ingredients in a blender on high speed until smooth.

array.string: This creamy and chocolaty smoothie is the best when you crave something sweet but still want to stay healthy.
Raspberry and chocolate tastes fantastic together and raw cacao nibs are extremely high in antioxidants.
Add some macca powder for an extra energy kick.
Mix all the ingredients in a blender on high speed until smooth.

Mix all the ingredients in a blender on high speed until smooth.

dict.string: Peanut butter and jelly
This rich and creamy smoothie is high in protein and is perfect after a workout or served as breakfast

array.string: This rich smoothie is high in protein and perfect after a workout or served as breakfast when you need some extra energy in the morning.
The fresh raspberry sauce complements the creamy smoothie perfectly.
Blend the raspberries with honey and pour the raspberry sauce in a glass.
Mix the rest of the ingredients in a blender on high speed until smooth.
Gently pour the smoothie over the raspberry sauce.

dict.string: Unbeetable
Beets are known for being anti-inflammatory and detoxifying

array.string: Beets are known for being anti-inflammatory and detoxifying which is one of the reasons they are great to put in your smoothie.
They also taste fantastic together with the tarty apple and lemon in this ruby red smoothie.
Juice the beet, apple and lemon in a juice extractor.
Mix the juice together with the raspberries, strawberries and banana in a blender on high speed until smooth

dict.string: Raspberry kick
This smoothie is a real vitamin kick with a fresh and summery taste

array.string: This smoothie is a real vitamin kick with a fresh and summery taste. Enjoy it on a hot sunny day or simply when you need some extra energy.
The mint can be replaced with ginger if preferred.
Squeeze the juice out of the orange and lime.
Mix all the ingredients in a blender on high speed until smooth

dict.string: Blue belly bliss
This dark blue smoothie is your stomach’s best friend

array.string: This dark blue smoothie is your stomach’s best friend. Drink it for breakfast or between meals. It contains lots of fibre and will get your stomach working.
Mix all the ingredients in a blender on high speed until smooth

dict.string: Layered blueberry and chia smoothie
This layered blueberry and chia smoothie is great served as breakfast and will give you a perfect start of the day

array.string: This layered blueberry and chia smoothie is great served as breakfast and will give you a perfect start of the day. Have the soaked chia seeds prepared in the fridge to save some valuable time in the morning.
Top with your favourite berries, fruits, nuts and seeds.
Soak chia seeds with almond milk and stir with a spoon or a hand mixer. Stir again after 10 minutes and make sure there are no lumps.
If needed, add more chia seeds or almond milk. The consistency shouldn't be runny.
The chia pudding is ready after another 10 minutes but can also be stored in the fridge over night.
Mix banana, raspberries, blueberries, almond milk and honey in a blender on high speed until smooth
Layer the soaked chia seeds with the blueberry smoothie in a bowl or a in a glass.
Add your favorite fruits and berries as topping. Eat with a spoon.

dict.string: Passion for chia
This layered passion fruit and chia smoothie is perfect served as a dessert or as breakfast

array.string: This layered passion fruit and chia smoothie is perfect served as a dessert or as breakfast.
Have the soaked chia seeds prepared in the fridge to save some valuable time in the morning.
Soak chia seeds with almond milk and stir with a spoon or a hand mixer. Stir again after 10 minutes and make sure there are no lumps.
If needed, add more chia seeds or almond milk. The consistency shouldn't be runny.
The chia pudding is ready after another 10 minutes but can also be stored in the fridge over night.
Mix banana, mango, raspberries, almond milk and honey in a blender on high speed until smooth.
Layer the soaked chia seeds with the smoothie and the passion fruit in a bowl or a in a glass.
Add your favorite fruits and berries as topping. Eat with a spoon.

dict.string: Strawberry nicecream with a raspberry swirl
Enjoy this pink and dreamy nicecream when you need some extra energy and vitamins or simply when you crave something sweet

array.string: Enjoy this pink and dreamy nicecream when you need some extra energy and vitamins or simply when you crave something sweet
Blend the raspberries with honey to a raspberry sauce.
Mix bananas, strawberries and coconut milk in a blender on high speed until smooth. Consistency should be thick and creamy.
Pour the strawberry nicecream oven the raspberry sauce in a glass or in a bowl. Stir with a spoon to create a beautiful swirl

array.string: Cinnamon is known to lower blood sugar levels and for being anti-bacterial.
This smoothie is also high in protein, antioxidants and has anti-inflammatory properties, so enjoy without the guilt!
Mix the mango with the honey to a mango sauce.
Mix the rest of the ingredients in a blender on high speed until smooth.
Gently pour the smoothie over the mango sauce.

dict.string: Cashew and raspberry smoothie
This creamy and rich smoothie is full of proteins, healthy fats and energizing vitamins

array.string: This creamy and rich smoothie is full of proteins, healthy fats and energizing vitamins. Perfect after a workout or as a luxurious breakfast.
Make sure you make some extra chia jam while you're at it and serve it together with pancakes, porridge or on toasts. It's delicious!
Mix the raspberries and add the chia seeds and honey. Let the raspberry jam set for 15 minutes.
Mix all the other ingredients in a blender on high speed until smooth.
Fill a glass halfway with the smoothie and then add a layer of raspberry jam before filling the glass with the rest of the smoothie.
Drink it with a straw or eat with a spoon.

dict.string: Tropical passion
A yellow tropical smoothie with lots of vitamins and minerals that nourishes skin, nails and hair

array.string: A yellow tropical smoothie with lots of minerals and vitamins that nourishes skin, nails and hair. Super delicious and great for that inner glow and extra energy.
Scoop out the passion fruit in a glass.
Mix all the other ingredients in a blender on high speed until smooth.
Pour the smoothie over the passion fruit.

dict.string: Acai bowl
Packed with vitamins and antioxidants, acai bowls are the perfect meal.

array.string: Packed with vitamins and antioxidants, acai bowls are the perfect meal.

A lot of the fun with smoothiebowls lies in the toppings where the options are endless. Experiment with nut butter, seeds, fresh fruit and berries or whatever you have at home in your pantry, fridge or garden.
Have the frozen banana in room temperature for a few minutes.
Mix all the ingredients in a blender on high speed until smooth. Add topping before serving.

dict.string: Raspberry and coconut smoothie
This coconut and raspberry smoothie will satisfy your sweet tooth in a healthy way.

array.string: This coconut and raspberry smoothie is both creamy and refreshing. It will satisfy your sweet tooth in a healthy way.
Squeeze the juice out of the orange.
Mix all the ingredients in a blender on high speed until smooth.
Top it with some fresh raspberries and roasted coconut flakes.

dict.string: Almond milk
Homemade almond milk tastes amazing and makes a perfect liquid base in smoothies

array.string: Homemade almond milk tastes amazing and makes a perfect liquid base in smoothies.
It can be stored in the fridge up to 3-4 days.
Soak the almonds in water for 12-48 hours. Cover them with about one inch of water and store them in the fridge. The longer they soak the creamier the milk will get.
Drain and rinse the nuts before mixing them with one liter of fresh cold water, dates and vanilla powder on high speed for 2-3 minutes.
Strain the liquid through a fine-mesh kitchen towel or a nut bag to separate the liquid from the nut meal.
Press out as much liquid as possible and store the milk in a glass bottle in the fridge.
